info.name: Visted and unvisited link distingusher
info.description:
an easy way to distinguish between the links you visited and did not visit.
Extremely useful in the new google chrome versions where it's all in one color.
info.additionalInfo:
To enable this only on google or specific sites - untick "all site",
click on "add Rule" then click on "perfix" and choose "regexp" instead and then type -  google.
